column4: I just installed Feisty and did all the updates and every time I open Open Office, when I move the mouse over any of the buttons it crashes. Where do I start to fix this?
I might try a sudo aptitude -f install to fix and packages that maybe broken or reintall OO
The bots are back and your gonna be in trouble - hey la hey la...
sudo aptitude -f install  didn't fix it and I used synaptic to mark openoffice for reinstallation, no luck :(
